markdownRemark.html:
https://codepen.io/pik_at/pen/dYWLrR

Safari does not support transparent in gradients. We need to use a fully transparent color instead with opacity 0

For flex direction = column, flex-basis=0 refers to the height, so we need to specify width:0 to make sure the initial width is 0 instead of their initial content
